bibl.title: Gin Kato v. Henry M. White. Order to Show Cause
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division.
In the Matter of the Application Wu Kao (NG GO) for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.

In this cause, upon reading the petition of Wu Kao (Ng Go), for a writ of habeas corpus, it is by the Court ORDERED and CONSIDERED, and the Court does hereby ORDER and CONSIDER, that Henry M. White, United States Commissioner of Immigration at the Port of Seattle, do appear before this Court on the 22 day of Nov, 1920, at the hour of 10:00 o'clock a.m., then and there to show cause, if any he has, why the above-named petition should not be granted and a writ of habeas corpus issued as therein prayed for. And with the that order of this court said Commissioner therein for repealing
DONE in open Court this 16 day of November, 1920.
In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington
In the Matter of the Application of Wu Kao (NG GO) for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
Filed in the United States District Court
Copy of within received and due service of same acknowledged this day of , A.D. 191
